CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&username=" + $User.Username + "&id=" + Id + "&queryid= [ParentInvoiceLine]aHxD7000000CbQTKA0,[OrderfromInvoice]aHxD7000000CbQYKA0" + "&templateid=aI5D70000008P70KAE" + "&fp0=1" + "&ac1=Invoice Generated" + "&sc0=1" + "&sc1=SalesforceFile" + "&ofn=Invoice for " + blng__Account__c + " - " + TEXT(TODAY()) + "&ac0=1" + "&templategroup=Invoice" + "&xdo=CIA" + "&xdo2=GenerateInvoice" + "&geo=" + $User.Country + "&emailtoid=" + blng__BillToContact__r.Id + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Additional_emails_to_send__c + "&congaemailtemplateid=aHwD700000033dYKAQ" + "&qmode=SendEmail"
CustomField.label: Invoice Document
